name: Asteroids (itch) (DavidTurull)
description:
This is an Asteroids game I made using the tutorial at http://gamecodeschool.com/unity/building-asteroids-arcade-game-in-unity/ as a base and I added a few more features to it including a high score list.

Controls:

  • Space, left mouse button or left Ctrl to fire bullets
  • Arrows keys or W, A, S and D keys to move the spaceship
